attributes.action: Stop England rugby player from being deported.
attributes.additional_details:
South-Africa born open-side, who has been living in the United Kingdom for eight years, has had his contract cancelled by Sale Sharks, meaning his visa is no longer valid.

Fourie, who qualified to play for England through residency and won eight caps, injured his shoulder playing against Ireland in 2011 and must leave the country by the end of the month.

He is 6 months from bring eligible for residency and was injured representing his adopted nation.
